name: FoodWIN
goal: FoodWIN supports European cities and motivated organisations to reduce food waste.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives:
EU FUSIONS: involved in organizing events
EU REFRESH: involved by organising events
Saving Food 2.0: working with Feedback Global to develop an app to redistribute food surplus
